title: 820-2936-A how to turn on without power button
message:
I wonder how to turn on 820-2936 board without button? What should I look for on a schematic or a board view? How are those pads called?
Thx

title: 820-2936-A how to turn on without power button
message: I have green light and fan turns on as soon as I connect power supply, in 20 seconds fan starts spinning at top speed.  I wish I could turn it on and see if there is any video at all.

title: 820-2936-A how to turn on without power button
message:
iFixit has info how to jumpstart MBP 2011 [url]https://www.ifixit.com/Answers/View/115622/Jumpstart+MacBook+Pro+2011[/url]

When pads are shorted - fan turns off and otherwise it goes at maximum speed. No video comes out of DP port

title: 820-2936-A how to turn on without power button
message: This motherboard turn on by itself after you connect charger, no need to short pads......  Fan speeds at max. because there is no trackpad attached or you have a sensor failure..... Does this board chime?? any blink on frontal white led??  display assemblly is connected??? any history about this board?? water damage, dropped, anything??

title: 820-2936-A how to turn on without power button
message: Thanks! It doesn't chime, got that board from eBay without any history for the sake of practicing, connected just fan and RAM. It doesn't look damaged or worked on. Where do I begin to make it chime?

title: 820-2936-A how to turn on without power button
message: Measure PPVCORE_S0_CPU and if it is not present look long and hard at R7402.
